targets.rawSql: select count(*) from events;
select count(*) from events where name='net_packet_dns'

select toStartOfInterval(ts, INTERVAL 1 minute) m, count(*) total, container_name, namespace from events
where $__timeFilter(ts) and name='net_packet_dns'
group by m, container_name, namespace
order by m;

select count(*) total, dns_questions[1] q1 from events
where $__timeFilter(ts) and name='net_packet_dns'
group by q1
order by total desc;

select count(*) total, dns_answers[1] q1 from events
where $__timeFilter(ts) and name='net_packet_dns' and dns_answers!='[]'
group by q1
order by total desc;
select count(*) from events where kind='exec'

select count(*) total, file_path, args from events
where $__timeFilter(ts) and kind='exec'
group by file_path, args
order by total desc
limit 100

select toStartOfInterval(ts, INTERVAL 1 minute) m, count(*) total, container_name, namespace from events
where $__timeFilter(ts) and kind='exec'
group by m, container_name, namespace
order by m;
select count(*) from events where kind='security'

select toStartOfInterval(ts, INTERVAL 1 minute) m, count(*) total, name from events
where $__timeFilter(ts) and kind='security'
group by m, name
order by m;
select count(*) from events where name='net_packet_tcp'

select toStartOfInterval(ts, INTERVAL 1 minute) m, count(*) total, namespace from events
where $__timeFilter(ts) and name='net_packet_tcp'
group by m, namespace
order by m;

select count(*) total, IPv4NumToStringClassC(dst_ip) ip from events
where $__timeFilter(ts) and name='net_packet_tcp'
group by ip
order by total desc;

select count(*) total, dst_port from events
where $__timeFilter(ts) and name='net_packet_tcp'
group by dst_port
order by total desc;

select count(*) total,
       if(greater(bitAnd(flags, 1),0), 'FIN|', '') ||
       if(greater(bitAnd(flags, 2),0), 'SYN|', '') ||
       if(greater(bitAnd(flags, 16),0), 'ACK|', '') ||
       if(greater(bitAnd(flags, 4),0), 'RST|', '') flags_str
from events
where $__timeFilter(ts) and kind='net' and name='net_packet_tcp'
group by flags_str
order by total desc;
select count(*) from events where name='file_modification'

select count(*) total, file_path from events
where $__timeFilter(ts) and name='file_modification'
group by file_path
order by total desc
limit 100;
select count(*) from events where kind='kube'

select count(*) total, name, severity from events
where kind='kube'
group by name, severity
order by total desc;

select toStartOfInterval(ts, INTERVAL 1 minute) m, count(*) total, severity from events
where $__timeFilter(ts) and kind='kube'
group by m, severity
order by m;
